attributes.action: allow all types of poultry on allotments (not just hens and rabbits as the current allotments act states at present)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that the present allotments act be revised to allow the keeping of all types of poultry etc Turkeys, Ducks and Geese and not just Hens as the act states at present.
